messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at school dance
messages.msgSnippet: Heather, I know what you mean. It does sound too bizarre to be true... But I can tell you that my nephew just graduated 2 years ago and he told us some bizarre
messages.messageBody:
Heather,

I know what you mean. It does sound too bizarre to be true... But I can tell you that my nephew just graduated 2 years ago and he told us some bizarre stories that happend to the kids in his school, (at the hands of officials). My husband is currently working in a pHs. He is teaching at a Magnet School, he teaches classes to prepare the kids for their Microsoft Certifications. Some of the things he tells me would really shock you.

Rebecca
----- Original Message -----
From: Heather Woodward
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 01, 2002 1:09 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at school dance


I almost think this is too bizarre to be true - Can you imagine?? Everytime I read something about schools - and their behavior - I am so glad to be able to have my kids at home :)

Heather
----- Original Message -----
From: Hazy_lilly
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 30, 2002 11:20 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at school dance


Rebecca,

I agree! What right do they have. At that age they
are vulnerable. I know if they tried it with me now
at my age. I would tell them where to go. I read
this and it turned my stomach.

Hazel
--- Kinkade <kinkade@...> wrote:
> This is the kind of story that both shocks and
> sickens me. It amazes me that School Officials will
> question what we are doing to our kids. Well what I
> want to know, is who gives them the right to
> question a girls underwear?
>
> Rebecca
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jon and Rue Kream
> To: rul@yahoogroups.com
> Cc: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 30, 2002 10:07 PM
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at
> school dance
>
>
>
>
http://www.cnn.com/2002/US/04/30/life.underwear.reut/index.html
>
> Socialization?
>
> ~Rue
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at school dance
messages.msgSnippet: This is the kind of story that both shocks and sickens me. It amazes me that School Officials will question what we are doing to our kids. Well what I want to
messages.messageBody:
This is the kind of story that both shocks and sickens me. It amazes me that School Officials will question what we are doing to our kids. Well what I want to know, is who gives them the right to question a girls underwear?

Rebecca
----- Original Message -----
From: Jon and Rue Kream
To: rul@yahoogroups.com
Cc: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 30, 2002 10:07 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] underwear check at school dance


http://www.cnn.com/2002/US/04/30/life.underwear.reut/index.html

Socialization?

~Rue
